item.title: Setup Production Ready Kubernetes on baremetal with kubespray
item.description: Kubespray is a composition of Ansible playbooks, inventory, provisioning tools, and domain knowledge for generic OS/Kubernetes clusters configuration management tasks. Prerequisites Hardware 5 Nodes: Virtual/Physical Machines Memory: 8GB CPU: 4Core Hard disk: 120GB available Software Kubernetes nodes Ubuntu 18.04 Python SSH Server Privileged user Kubespray machine Ansible 2.7.8+(not 2.8.x) Jinja 2.9+ Nodes Networking requisites Internet access to download docker images and install softwares IPv4 Forwarding should be enabled In order to avoid any issue during deployment, you should disable firewall.
